name: The Demit (#2)
description:
I am struggling with my arts. Something that hits me so bad. Which is pornography, religion, culture, etc. I am sick of it! I don't mean to fight against them. Just express me through the arts. I create The Demit, people said it is inappropriate! It is porn! It's a sin! Big sin! I have no backup, intelligence is not enough for them. Just violence. They don't really care about what I am trying to tell them through my arts. They see what they see. Also, I was disturbed by people who always blamed for all bad things happen to them. Someday, my brother died in a traffic accident and the one who hit him, he said that he was unconscious and didn't watch my brother ride through him. Like see a Demit (demon). It was at night, try to make it sense and be sorry. Until I heard that somewhere in Thailand if you did something wrong (crime) in this case you are possessed by a demon you free to go. Out of human law. But it is a higher level of law. I disagree if there is any mistake in what people do they always blame it on Demit. So through my words and illustrations, I wanna ask people to think again and ask for ourselves that everything we do has a consequence and all about it is came from us. Not the others. You are your own demon.
